name: Naiad
description: The Naiad embodies the grace and beauty of aquatic environments, with features reflective of its nature.
memorable: Magic Resistance and ability to communicate with nature add unique strategic elements.
goals: Typically seeks to protect its aquatic habitat and interact with nature.
relations: Often found alongside other fey or in ecosystems involving water.
environment: Aquatic and natural environments, such as rivers, lakes, and wetlands.
strengths: Versatile in combat, able to grapple and control opponents while swimming.
attacks: Watery Grasp allows it to grapple foes while dealing bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
skills: It has notable proficiency in perception, stealth, and nature.
additional_information: Amphibious, able to breathe both air and water.
Can communicate with beasts and plants.
Graceful movement in water enhances its combat effectiveness.
test_queries: graceful creature that communicates with nature
aquatic monster that can breathe underwater
medium-sized fey known for watery grasp
